text: @SupraDarky Just for the record, I think it's one of the best Kirby games ever made. It plays very much like Super Star and the level design is intense. Also of note are the graphics and the friggin music is superb!
author: Mitchfynde

text:
That stare...
That intense, undying stare...
Analysing your very soul, finding every piece of nutrient available in your body, so that he'll know how you taste when he ingests you.
Because he will. Kirby has an insatiable appetite for all living beings. He's already smiling from the idea of savoring your limbs AND the agony you'll have trapped in his monstruous body.
He already ingested all of the free space in the screen.
DON'T YOU SEE???
KIRBY'S COMING FOR US!!!
Arrggggggggg :P
author: C_Clop

text:
First off, this game is awesome! If you haven't played it yet you are missing out. The difficulty ramps up (it starts easy) and unlike Mario on Wii (which is awesome 1 player), you can actually play 4 players at once without screwing each other up. Very underrated and a great way to play with non-hardcore gamers and still have fun.

That said, the start of this song reminds me of "Somewhere Over The Rainbow", haha.
